name: Move: da block
description:
This game is made for Curdle Jam #29

Theme: played like a fiddle

WebGL sucks so download the game for better fps and gameplay

Use fullscreen to see your score and better see your triangle

Instructions:

W/↑move upS/↓move down

White blocks kill you, Red blocks remove 1 point, Gold blocks give you 3 points and blue blocks give you 1 point.

How does this game fit the theme of the game jam?:

The theme of the jam was: "Played like a fiddle" meaning manipulate something  to your advantage. You need to to manipulate the blocks to not die (your advanta
